ib.a kt [ele] steal, rob, lift, prey, thieve; appropriate, make away with sth; go off with sth; kidnap; peculate; (maandishi) plagiarize. (tde) ibia; (tdk) ibika; (tdn) ibana; (tdw) ibwa.
